messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4849
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/12/2004 8:53:31 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: ... LOL. He s pretty much got honourary Canuck
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/12/2004 8:53:31 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Kathryn writes:
>Michael Moore, at the Democratic convention this year described Canada as
>"Like us-only better."
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

LOL. He's pretty much got honourary Canuck status here. He even made some
pretty direct comments about our recent election (dissing the right wing party
here) and there was no uproar from Canadians about an American sticking his
nose where it doesn't belong...because, I guess, he does belong. Of course we're
always flattered when we find an American that knows as much or more about us
and our politics then we do. It's usually the other way around. :)
****************************
I just remembered the other thing he said, which cracked me up. He said,
"Canadians really do like us, you know. They just wish we would read and pay
attention more."
Kathryn


Kathryn Baptista, Conference Coordinator

Come to the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference August 27-29 in Peabody, MA!
For more information, go to www.LiveandLearnConference.org
